title: Flare Network Burns 2.1 Billion $FLR Tokens, Boosting Network Development After Airdrop to $XRP Holders
description: Flare, the project that airdropped tokens to holders of the native token of the XRP Ledger, $XRP, who were holding onto their tokens at the time of a network snapshot back in December 2020, is set to burn 2.1 billion of its own $FLR tokens in a bid to support its ecosystem’s health and development. […]
